title.rendered: Vaughan Handyman: 5 Simple and Affordable Ideas to Transform Your Kitchen

content.rendered:
The kitchen plays a central role in every home; for many families, it is a place to gather and share meals, talk about your day, or perform routine tasks. The kitchen is the heart of most homes, but that heart doesn’t always beat with the same lustre as it once did. The room becomes dated and in need of upgrades. Unfortunately, most homeowners believe kitchen remodelling services and projects are cost-prohibitive.

Not all remodelling projects are expensive. Some simple changes can make significant impacts. Discovering what little changes you can make to ensure an affordable transformation requires the help of a professional contractor. Discover five affordable kitchen upgrades from Handyman Connection, a trusted Vaughan neighbour.

5 Tips for Quick and Affordable Kitchen Upgrades

Not all kitchen renovations require experienced plumbers. You can make minor changes with massive effects on the kitchen without touching plumbing or electrical systems. The main issue is understanding which areas or items in the kitchen will significantly impact the design.

For budget-conscious homeowners, five items create dramatic effects. Discover how your kitchen can go from drab to fabulous by focusing on minor upgrades.

1. Backsplash

The kitchen backsplash serves a practical and design purpose; it keeps walls clean and adds visual appeal. When properly cared for, the material can last as long as your counters and other surfaces, but the design may not stand the test of time.

Investing a little money can allow you to swap out old tile or stonework for something more contemporary. You can also look for unique installation options like slabs, which are more affordable for smaller areas like a backsplash.

2. Countertop

Countertops take the most abuse in the kitchen. Depending on the material, they may show signs of wear more easily than other elements in the kitchen.

You can choose from many options for countertop replacements, including granite, natural stone, or butcher block. Butcher block is the most affordable of the three options and creates a warm and inviting atmosphere. Countertops are more expensive than backsplashes but less expensive than a complete rehab.

3. Lighting

Kitchen lighting also doesn’t always stand the test of time. The beauty of lighting is you can replace fixtures without spending a lot of moolah. However, the price will increase if you plan on using kitchen remodelling services to move lighting or install fixtures where no wiring currently exists. Consult a licensed electrician for more information about installation costs.

4. Cabinets

Kitchen cabinets often make the space. While replacing cabinets with custom options is costly, you can buy prefabricated options and save money. You can add moulding and specialty knobs to make the store-bought options more attractive.

You might be able to refinish your existing cabinets, saving the expense and hassle of removal and installation. You can paint or restain the surface to create a different look for the whole kitchen.

5. Paint

Out of all the affordable upgrades, the cheapest option to improve or update the look of your kitchen is paint. Refreshing your walls with a brighter, updated colour scheme can revamp the entire space.
If you want the job done quickly, you can hire a handyman in Vaughan. Search for an experienced painter working with a legitimate service.

Remodelling Services You Can Count On

If you want to revamp your kitchen and bring it into the current decade, you can hire kitchen remodelling services in Vaughan. However, if your budget is tight and you still want to make a change, focus on the items with the most significant impact. Contact Handyman Connection to discuss remodelling options on a budget.
